verbose_text: In summary, miR-421-5p was demonstrated to bind to MAPK7 3 '-UTR, inhibit the expression of MAPK7, and significantly reduce the expression of MAPK7, c-Fos, c-Myc, CREB and p-CREB, indicating that miR-421-5p can target the MAPK signaling pathway.
evidence: expression of MAPK7, c-Fos, c-Myc, CREB
